Top Luxury Airbnbs In Hyderabad From Farm Stays To Apartments

By AK
406 Interested |
4.8K  Views
Photo source: Airbnb

Looking for a luxurious weekend getaway? Or perhaps you wish to pamper yourself for the long week it has been (and we totally get it!). We have curated the ultimate guide to the best luxury Airbnbs in Hyderabad, serving the best of amenities, aesthetics, and everything necessary for much-needed luxurious TLC. Bookmark this guide for your next getaway! 

Overview

 
  1. 1. The Aurora
  2. 2. Ostello Isabello
  3. 3. Enclave Vista
  4. 4. White House Villa
  5. 5. Cezara Farm House
  6. 6. Lago Vista Blanca
  7. 7. Sector N

Here Are The Best Luxury Airbnbs In Hyderabad

The Aurora

Photo source: Airbnb

The Aurora - Banjara Hills

BOOK HERE

Located in one of the most premium areas in Hyderabad, Banjara Hills, The Aurora is a quaint, 2,700 sqft apartment. Perfect for families, a group of friends, and couples looking for a long and pleasant stay, this Airbnb in Hyderabad is done up tastefully across the three bedrooms, living space, and kitchen. Think traditional Kashmiri carpets, warm yellow lighting, wallpapers, indoor plants, and artisanal wooden furniture. All three bedrooms come with attached bathrooms, and the kitchen is stocked up and well-equipped for all kinds of cooking. Spend your evenings with a warm cup of Irani chai and rest with the sunsets from the large balcony. From cafes and malls to tourist attractions, everything is well connected from Banjara Hills, so you are sorted. 

Airbnb rating: 5/5

Approximate price: INR 40,000 for 5 nights

Perfect for: 6 guests

Ostello Isabello

Photo source: Airbnb

Ostello Isabello - Madhapur

BOOK HERE

This Airbnb in Hyderabad comes with a private balcony that overlooks a park, a bakery thats a few footsteps away for fresh bakes and coffee, and a dedicated work area for your hustles. Welcome lots of sunlight via the French windows and enjoy the natural breeze on good days. The space comes with one bedroom, an attached bathroom, and a king-size bed ideal for two people. What we love is that this humble home comes with a shared kitchen for conversations over coffee and breakfast. 

Airbnb rating: 5/5

Approximate price: INR 11,000 for 5 nights

Perfect for: 2 guests

Enclave Vista

Photo source: Airbnb

Enclave Vista - Banjara Hills

BOOK HERE

Enclave Vista is a four-bedroom, six-bed, and four-bathroom luxurious Airbnb in Hyderabad, and were impressed with the interiors and vibe of this place. Statement walls, warm lighting, interesting wall paintings, and lots of space; youd think its right out of Pinterest, too. Located in the plush side of Banjara Hills, many popular cafes, restaurants, malls, and theaters are barely a few minutes away. But being a busy area, the best way to travel is via autos and cabs, both easily available from the location of this Airbnb. 

Airbnb rating: 4/5

Approximate price: INR 54,000 for 5 nights

Perfect for: 10 guests

White House Villa

Photo source: Airbnb

White House Villa

BOOK HERE

This luxurious Airbnb in Hyderabad is a huge three-bedroom villa, but not an ordinary one. You can have movie marathons in the home theatre room with a starry sky roof and recliner couches, feel your best in the jacuzzi, and laze in the balcony with grass mats and have endless conversations. Oh, and the best part? The jacuzzi has a smaller TV in the bathroom. Yes, now thats some experience. The entire space is done tastefully with all white classy interiors and warm lighting.

Airbnb rating: 5/5

Approximate price: INR 68,000 for 5 nights

Perfect for: 6 guests

Cezara Farm House

Photo source: Airbnb

Cezara Farm House

BOOK HERE

A pool, huge backyard, three bedrooms, aesthetic dining, and a conversation-pit style living room this luxurious Airbnb in Hyderabad is calling your name if youre a big group of pals waiting to let loose in style. We love the brick walls and end-to-end French windows in the living room, which will make for a great picture wall. Speaking of walls, an entire section of the living room is a book wall made with a clean wooden design. With a backyard view on both sides, its a perfect setting for a bookbug. But wait till you check out the sunroof that houses the dining table under it with a pool view. The rooms are well equipped with all the essentials, and the pool is pristine and well-maintained, ready for you to splash. Sunsets? 

Airbnb rating: 5/5

Approximate price: INR 143,788 for 5 nights

Perfect for: 12 guests

Lago Vista Blanca

Photo source: Airbnb

Lago Vista - Blanca

BOOK HERE

We have found an Airbnb that feels like its straight out of a movie, and no, we wont gate keep. Overlooking a lake through its big glass wall is Lago Vista Blanca in Shivarampally, away from the hustle and bustle of the city. This is a luxurious stay ideal for families seeking a peaceful getaway and couples alike. White marbled floors, spotlighting on the ceiling, bedrooms with minimal, clean decor, the vibe here is as peaceful as it looks. Your mornings will start with bird calls and end with the sound of a soft breeze. From the living room, you can step out and spend time in the garden and click pictures with the backdrop of the lake.

Airbnb rating: New listing

Approximate price: INR 34,000 for 5 nights

Perfect for: 6 guests

Sector N

Photo source: Airbnb

Sector N

BOOK HERE

Always fancied staying in a mansion like the ones youve seen in shows and movies? Check out Sector N, a luxurious Airbnb in Hyderabad that stands out in many ways. A garden with Portuguese-style sit-outs, a swimming pool, lamp posts for lights, and well-maintained shrubs. The indoors include a lavish living room with roof lighting and a 10-seater sofa that compliments the rich marble flooring perfectly, an open kitchen with beautiful counters, an equally big circular dining table, and bedrooms straight out of an interior design magazine. Were talking paneled walls, wallpaper, rattan wardrobes, sleek bedding, and windows for natural ventilation. You also get to plan your movie nights outdoors near the pool, as it comes with a projector that screens across the pool.

Airbnb rating: New listing

Approximate price: INR 308,118 for 5 nights

Perfect for: 12 guests

White Teak Suites

A luxurious Airbnb in Hyderabad bang in the middle of the IT hustle, it can't get better than this if you are a working professional looking for a place to crash in the city. We're saying this because White Teak Suites is a three bedroom, 2 baths, one hall and kitchen set up in Madhapur, in close proximity to the financial district, hi-tech city and Gachibowli. But this is not what makes it luxurious. The home comes with a 50 inch smart TV, beautiful Italian marble flooring, a modular kitchen, and a private balcony. The interiors are tastefully done with paneled TV console, white textured walls and large paintings which make for aesthetic photo walls. 

Airbnb rating: 5/5

Approximate price: INR 10,995 for 1 night 

Perfect for: 6 guests

Image: https://www.airbnb.co.in/rooms/1166954981235955775?check_in=2025-05-15&check_out=2025-05-16&location=Hyderabad&search_mode=regular_search&source_impression_id=p3_1746381287_P369VGgTkl8Qv55F&previous_page_section_name=1001&federated_search_id=ce752ed6-f264-4d64-b69d-11c01eb60632%3C/p%3E&utm_source=LBB&ref=lbbpost

Beatbox by MagoStays

A swimming pool for impromptu dips, home theatre for chatty movie nights and a open air sit out to gaze at the stars or enjoy sunsets; we found a 2BHK pool villa with a living room that's real cozy, overlooking the pool. The dining area is completely wooden and it gives old school vibes. The bedrooms? Spacious with king size beds and ACs. If there weren't enough spots to cool down in this luxurious Airbnb in Hyderabad, you can sit down with your friends, drink up and have a feast on artsy benches in the open balcony.

Airbnb rating: 5/5

Approximate price: INR 12,000 for 1 night 

Perfect for: 10 guests

Image: https://www.airbnb.co.in/rooms/1267437765658216239?check_in=2025-05-15&check_out=2025-05-16&location=Hyderabad&search_mode=regular_search&source_impression_id=p3_1746381264_P3bVZAU47yu8bTbh&previous_page_section_name=1001&federated_search_id=ce752ed6-f264-4d64-b69d-11c01eb60632%3C/p%3E&utm_source=LBB&ref=lbbpost
